titles.title: A resolution relative to the death of Howell T. Heflin, former United States Senator for the State of Alabama.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 4/4/2005--Passed Senate without amendment. Declares that the Senate has heard with profound sorrow and deep regret the announcement of the death of the Honorable Howell T. Heflin, a former member of the United States Senate. Declares that when the Senate adjourns on April 4, 2005, it stand adjourned as a further mark of respect to the memory of Senator Helflin.
